item.title: CVE-2022-36378|2024-08-03T10:00:04.376Z -- pluginlyspeaking -- floating%20div%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Authenticated (author or higher user role) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in PluginlySpeaking Floating Div plugin <= 3.0 at WordPress.
